channel.title: Npc's tp aggressive att you i dont want that
channel.description:
i got ddsspeced and as soon as you tele to pk the green drags att you they all do how i make them not so aggressive?
wassup868@hotmail.com or post here pl0x i need help

item.title: Npc's tp aggressive att you i dont want that
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Look in NPCHandler.java and search for the npc’s in your case the dragons id you can get it by right clicking him in game then keep searching till you see something like

  if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
                                            || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 1220)  {
                                        npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
                                        npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
                                        npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
                                    }

Then take out your npc’s id if it still doesn’t help then open autospawn.cfg and change the walk range so that he doesn’t walk around

Read full topic
